H0.text: Which Australian prime minister was presumed drowned in 1967. Robert Menzies

H1.text: Which Australian prime minister was presumed drowned in 1967. John McEwen

H2.text: Which Australian prime minister was presumed drowned in 1967. John Gorton

H3.text: Which Australian prime minister was presumed drowned in 1967. Harold Holt

A4.text: In December 1967, Holt disappeared while swimming in rough conditions at Cheviot Beach, Victoria. He was presumed dead, although his body was never recovered.

A5.text: Holt was sworn in as prime minister on 26 January 1966, following the retirement of Robert Menzies six days earlier.
